snippet.title: Vertigo 2 PS VR 2 Release Date Trailer - Future Games Show at Gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
An exciting gameplay and accolades trailer revealed that the intergalactic VR FPS Vertigo 2 is coming to PS VR 2 on October 24, 2023.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
